Dacor Appliance Repair – Expert Care for a Brand That Embodies Innovation and Luxury

Your Dacor appliance is more than a kitchen tool—it’s a fusion of cutting-edge technology, modern design, and professional performance. Whether it’s a sleek wall oven, a smart cooktop, or a built-in refrigerator, Dacor is a luxury brand chosen by those who expect more from their home appliances.

When your Dacor unit needs servicing, don’t trust it to just anyone. At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we specialize in Dacor appliance repair, offering factory-level precision, brand-trained technicians, and a service experience as refined as the appliances we care for.

🔧 Why Choose Zaricci for Dacor Appliance Repair?

  • ✅ Dacor-Specific Expertise: Dacor’s innovative features—like Wi-Fi connectivity, touchscreen controls, and chef-mode precision—require a technician who knows the brand. Our certified experts are trained specifically to handle the technology and mechanics behind Dacor’s high-end systems.
  • 🧩 Only Genuine Dacor Parts: We use authentic manufacturer-approved parts to maintain your appliance’s performance, warranty coverage, and long-term reliability.
  • ⏱️ Same-Day or Next-Day Availability: We offer fast and flexible scheduling because we understand that a luxury appliance should never leave you waiting.
  • 💬 Upfront Pricing, No Hidden Fees: We provide transparent quotes before work begins—so you know exactly what to expect, every step of the way.

🛠️ We Repair All Dacor Appliance Categories

🔥 Dacor Ranges & Ovens

  • Touchscreen or control panel malfunctions
  • Uneven heating or temperature fluctuations
  • Gas burner ignition issues
  • Broiler not functioning
  • Smart appliance connectivity problems

❄️ Dacor Refrigerators

  • Inconsistent cooling
  • Ice maker not working
  • Door not sealing properly
  • Digital control issues
  • Compressor or fan failures

💨 Dacor Cooktops

  • Induction or gas burner problems
  • Error codes or unresponsive controls
  • Flame irregularities
  • Broken knobs or glass surfaces

🚿 Dacor Dishwashers

  • Leaking water or drainage issues
  • Poor cleaning performance
  • Control panel errors
  • Loud or unusual noises during cycles

👨‍🔧 Our White-Glove Service Process

  • Schedule Your Appointment: Call us or book online. We’ll set up a time that’s convenient for your schedule.
  • On-Site Diagnostics: Your Zaricci-certified technician arrives on time and performs a full assessment of your Dacor appliance.
  • Detailed Estimate: We’ll walk you through the issue and present a transparent, itemized quote for parts and labor.
  • Precision Repairs with Genuine Parts: We complete your repair with authentic Dacor components and test thoroughly for full functionality.
  • Final Inspection & Warranty: Every repair is backed by a service guarantee, giving you complete peace of mind.
